foundNothing.title: Nothing Found
foundNothing.description: You carefully search the area but find nothing of interest.

foundNothing.title: No Luck
foundNothing.description: Your search yields nothing but dust and cobwebs.

foundNothing.title: Empty-Handed
foundNothing.description: Despite a thorough search, there is nothing here worth taking.

foundNothing.title: No Items of Significance
foundNothing.description: Even after meticulously searching, you uncover no items of significance.

foundNothing.title: Nothing Noteworthy
foundNothing.description: Your thorough examination yields no noteworthy findings.

foundNothing.title: Nothing Remarkable
foundNothing.description: Despite your diligent efforts, nothing remarkable comes to light.

foundNothing.title: No Items of Intrigue
foundNothing.description: Your intensive search turns up empty, revealing no items of intrigue.

foundNothing.title: Devoid of Interest
foundNothing.description: After an exhaustive investigation, you find nothing that sparks curiosity.

foundNothing.title: False Promise
foundNothing.description: For a moment it seems promising, but closer inspection reveals nothing of value.

foundNothing.title: Cold Trail
foundNothing.description: Every lead fizzles out, leaving you with the sense that this path leads nowhere.

foundNothing.title: Dead End
foundNothing.description: However carefully you search, there is simply nothing here to uncover.

foundNothing.title: Only Appearances
foundNothing.description: At first glance it feels meaningful, but closer scrutiny reveals only the ordinary.

foundNothing.title: Missed Opportunity
foundNothing.description: If something was once here, it has long since been taken or erased.

foundNothing.title: Silence Answers Back
foundNothing.description: You search carefully, but the space offers no answers in return.

foundNothing.title: Nothing to Grasp
foundNothing.description: Your efforts reveal no clues, no tools, no threads to pull.

foundNothing.title: Unrewarded Effort
foundNothing.description: The search is thorough, but ultimately unrewarding.

foundNothing.title: All Clear
foundNothing.description: There is nothing hidden here, and nothing left behind.

foundNothing.title: Careful but Fruitless
foundNothing.description: You take your time, double-checking your work, yet find nothing of note.

foundNothing.title: Nothing Out of Place
foundNothing.description: Everything appears exactly as it should. No clues stand out.

foundNothing.title: A Quiet Search
foundNothing.description: Your careful inspection reveals only silence and stillness.

foundNothing.title: No Hidden Truths
foundNothing.description: Whatever secrets might exist are not here to be found.

foundSomething.title: Search Results
foundSomething.description: You carefully examine your surroundings, your gaze sweeping across everything. Your thoroughness proves advantageous.

foundSomething.title: Findings
foundSomething.description: Your search pays off. You've turned up a few things of interest.

foundSomething.title: What's Here
foundSomething.description: A careful look around reveals some items worth noting.

foundSomething.title: Methodical Search
foundSomething.description: With meticulous care, you scour every nook and cranny, leaving no stone unturned.

foundSomething.title: Keen Eye
foundSomething.description: You comb through the space with a keen eye, attuned to even the slightest irregularity.

foundSomething.title: Careful Inspection
foundSomething.description: Your eyes move deliberately over every detail, searching for anything out of the ordinary.

foundSomething.title: Hidden Details
foundSomething.description: A careful examination brings subtle details into focus, hinting at something worth attention.

foundSomething.title: Focused Effort
foundSomething.description: You investigate with unwavering focus, uncovering what lies just beneath the surface.

foundSomething.title: Something Stirs
foundSomething.description: At first it blends in, but closer inspection reveals something that doesn't quite belong.

foundSomething.title: Promising Discovery
foundSomething.description: Your careful approach is rewarded with a promising discovery.

foundSomething.description: A small but meaningful detail catches your attention.

foundSomething.title: Worth a Second Look

foundSomething.description: In the stillness, a hidden detail quietly reveals itself.

foundSomething.title: Uneasy Detail
foundSomething.description: One small detail feels wrong, and it draws your attention immediately.

foundSomething.title: Trace Evidence
foundSomething.description: Though subtle, there is clear evidence that something happened here.

foundSomething.title: Care Rewards You
foundSomething.description: Your patience and attention to detail pay off.

foundSomething.title: Hidden in Plain Sight
foundSomething.description: What you find was easy to miss, but impossible to ignore once noticed.

foundSomething.title: Telling Detail

foundSomething.title: Subtle Clue
